title: Advice to match Relato Serif with a Sans.
content: In preparation of my print portfolio, I'm considering in using a sans together with my serif of choice, Relato Serif by Emtype.net. It's too bad that Relato Sans isn't out yet. I'm open to any suggestions to pair Relato Serif together with a Sans. Cheerio.
author: Hinching Chan

comments.content: Maybe contact [Eduardo Manso](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021001008/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eduardo%20Manso) to see if you can get an advanced copy of Relato Sans?
